## Expectation.toBeAnArrayOfLength() method

Checks if the values is an array containing exactly given number of items.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toBeAnArrayOfLength(this: Expectation<ReadonlyArray<any>>, length: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  this | [Expectation](./earljs.expectation.md)<!-- -->&lt;ReadonlyArray&lt;any&gt;&gt; |  |
|  length | number | expected array length. Can be a matcher. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
